item.title: From SQLi to PHP deserialize to RCE on Pandora FMS 742
item.author: edisc.ctf@gmail.com (Edisc)
item.description: From SQLi to PHP deserialize to RCE on Pandora FMS 742 Welcome to my blog, dedicated to unraveling the intricated world of PHP vulnerabilities! Today, I‚Äôm thrilled to share my latest research findings on Pandora FMS 742, a prominent network monitoring tool. In my pursuit of enhancing the security landscape, I‚Äôve meticulously analyzed the critical code vulnerabilities inherent in this widely-used software. I Introducing Pandora FMS 742 Pandora FMS is a monitoring software that collects data from any system, generates alerts based on that data and shows graphs, reports and maps of our environment.
item.dc:creator: Edisc
